import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, FormGroup, ControlLabel, FormControl, Col, Grid, Row, Button, ButtonToolbar} from 'react-bootstrap'; const nameRegex = new RegExp('[A-Za-z0-9]{2}'); export default class PersonalDetailsForm extends Component { validateName(event){ if(event.target.value.length === 2 && nameRegex.test(event.target.value)){ event.target.className = "form-control is-valid"; }else{ event.target.className = "form-control is-invalid"; } } constructor(props){ super(props); this.state ={ title: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', suffix: '', DOB:'', gender: '' } }; render() { return (

Personal Details Page

*Title: *First Name: *Surname: *Suffix: *Date of Birth: *Gender:
); } }
